about_the_game:
😼Wake up Kitty, you have cats to shoot😼

Catnight is an online multiplayer third-person perspective game that will heat up any party. You will not only fight with your opponents and the enormous amount of furry bullets in the air, but you will also need to survive special gameplay circumstances, which will make every match more dynamic and funnier.

😼Features:😼

😼Online Multiplayer 😼
We know that the best moments are those, that you spend with your crazy friends, so now you have a chance to have fun with them even during a pandemic. Are you still reading this? Don’t waste your time and find out by yourself.


😼So much fun😼
You are fed up with the puffed-up TPP games? Then Catnight is just for you. You will find overwhelming joy in this game. Only the rivalry during the matches will be serious. Fasten your seat belts and arm yourself with kitties.

name: Catnight Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 or AMD FX-8370
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650, 2 GB or AMD Radeon HD 7770, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 or AMD FX-8370
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650, 2 GB or AMD Radeon HD 7770, 2 GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: 😼Being a cat is sometimes so frustrating! Just grab a gun and shoot some furballs. Catnight is an online shooting multiplayer TPP party game with many surprising modes. No game will ever be the same. Just smashcat your opponents!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
